name: 白俊恩
objective: 本課程目的在啟發學生英語聽力，分析及思辨能力。本課程自報紙，雜誌及電視選取豐富的教材, 以訓練聽力及筆記的技巧。 此外，在課堂上將討論一些有爭議性的或者有趣的議題，以培養學生獨立思辨能力。
schedule:
9/12 Meet ‘n’ Greet; intro to the class; Sir Ken Robinson: “Do Schools Kill …?” 
9/19 Word chemistry
9/26 Collocation and concordance: rip, strip, recycle
10/3 Sample self-introductions – coherence, content; Chris Anderson TED Talk
10/10 HOLIDAY 
10/17 Sample self-introductions – coherence, content (cont’d); schedule self-intros
10/24 Self-introduction Group 1
10/31 Self-introduction Group 2
11/7 MIDTERM EXAM
11/14 Straggler self-intros
11/21 SEE NOTES; ASK IF THEY WANT TO DO 2nd Presentation
11/28 Ally McBeal Pilot + relationships diagram
12/5 Oral Presentation 2 – Ally Pilot spokespersons + feedback
12/12 Oral Presentation 2
12/19 Reading Television: “It’s a Wonderful Lie” + Simpsons Roasting
12/26 Final Oral
1/2 Final Oral
1/9 Final Oral + SELF-EVALUATION
scorePolicy:
midterm = 20%
final = 20%
participation = 60%

NOTE: Participation includes attendance.
materials: The instructor will provide any written materials in pdf form for students to download/copy. We will also use a variety of DVD and online resources, e.g., TED Talks.
